item.description: This month we'll tackle the subject of immigration. In the first part of the discussion, members will share stories about their own or their ancestors arrival to this country. In the second, we will give our opinions about how the current government is or is not addressing the problems of immigration. Karen and Joe will facilitate. A small amount of snack food will be appreciated.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: July Tertulia: Immigration
